transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, good morning sir.
Customer: Yeah, good morning.
Executive: Rajesh India Mart Saturday personal.
Customer: Ah, yes. Sollunga Rajesh.
Customer: Sir mail receive sir ninga anupinathu plus namma panthoma.
Executive: Unga voice break aaguthu. Hello?
Customer: Sir ippo ketkuthungala sir?
Executive: Ah, sollunga.
Customer: Sir ippo sign in panthoma theriya illame?
Executive: Ah, panniyachu ellam.
Customer: Super sir. Kaalile pannitingala sir vandhama? Yenna dashboard paathurukinge. Okay, super sir. Unga mail enakku receive aachu sir. Idhukku appuram oru vaati check panni paarungale eppadi irukkunnu. Yenna kandippa sollunga sir vera oru login la thaan aayirukkum. Vera oru systemo illa namma namma office systemo illa enga employee aairukka OTP share panni ippadi thaan irukkum.
Executive: Ippadiye solladhinga. Rajesh thirumbi thirumbi idhe vaarthai.
Customer: Sollunga sir, sollunga.
Executive: Login OTP potta login pannama eppadi unga login aagum?
Executive: Ennoda ennoda adhe browserle vandhu naan innaikku kaalaila kooda OTP pottu thaan login pannom. Appa eppadi innoru systemle aagum?
Customer: Okay sir idhukku appuram unakku therinjirum sir. Yenna sign out all device namma koduthuttom ningala. Idhukku appuram theri vandhurum. Naan IT teamle.
Customer: Sir appadi kidayathu sir. Neenga andha maari thappa eduthukkaadhinga.
Executive: Appuram?
Executive: Adhu enggakitta engga related producta irundha kooda parava illa. Yedho thevai illatha product naan eppadi responsible aagum?
Customer: Sir commission nadathukkuren sir. IT teamle submit.
Executive: Panniyachu ellam.
Executive: Unga sidele irundhu issue thallurathukkaaga summa vandhu oru maari blame excuse solladhinga. Theriyaadhunna theriyaadhunnu sollunga avlodhaan.
Customer: Sir andha maari illa sir. Idhu oru option thaan sir. Sign out all device.
Executive: Naan adhaan solren. Irukkuradhu rendu rendu mobile numberle thaan activate panni irukkom. Andha activate ennoda browserle ennoda systemle naan innaikku kaalaila login pannadhukku kooda OTP pottu thaan login panni irukkom. Appa eppadi aagum?
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: OTP varaama eppadi login aagum innoru websitele?
Customer: Panna mudiyaadhu sir. Panna mudiyaadhu sir. Idhu oru option sir. Sign out to all device appidingarathu oru option sir. Yenna mobile app oru thadava install pannitta oru thadava avlodhaan adhodu thirumbi install pannanum avasiyam kidayathu. Andha oru purpose thaan sign out all.
Executive: Mobile activate mobile appe vandhu naan vandhu delete panniyachu appave.
Executive: Yaerkkanave indha idhu vandhu enakku usee kidayathu. Adhu kooda summa vandhu yedho advertisement pottu naanga yedhukku login pannanum?
Executive: Pannunna naanga engga product.
Customer: IT teamle correct sir. IT teamle submit panniyachu sir. Ennanu ellame. Oru aadu neenga paathingala yedho 19th datele oru aadu potturukkaanga. Yedho oru requirement post pannirukken appadinnu potturukkaanga.
Executive: Yedhukku naan Mumbai pottu search pannanum?
Executive: Laminated pasting on plywood.
Executive: For Mumbai le potturukkaanga. 19th oru aadu le yedho 19 rupees something yedho.
Executive: Yedhukku naan Mumbai pottu paakkanum? Appadi paathaa kooda naan Chennai thaan paakkanum.
Customer: Aama sir.
Customer: Summa vandhu yedho oru reason vandhu unga sidele irundhu thalli vidurathukkaaga naanga vandhu login.
Customer: Illa adhu kidayathu sir. Idhu.
Customer: Sir andha maari kidayathu sir. Idhu oru option sir idhu. Idhu namma pannittom appidina IT team alert. Yenna IT team koduthura first option idhu thaan solluvaanga.
Executive: Adutha moonu naalule enakku vandhu formally enakku enna reason enakku pottu vaaranam illa appidina adutha legal complaint thaan paarunga.
Customer: Summa vandhu.
Executive: Submit panniyachu sir.
Customer: Sir andha maari kidave kidayathu sir idhule. OTP podama yaarumae thappa use panna mudiyaadhu. Add panni irukkaangannarathukku naan oru vaati check panren. Sign out all device na unga sidele login aayirukkunna.
Customer: Idhu first oru option sir. Aama sir idhu oru first option sir idhu. Neenga pannittom appidina yenna eduththunna idhu thaan solluvaanga. Customer vandhu all device login logout kodunga appadinnu solluvaanga sir.
Executive: Naane salesle thaan irukken enggakitta vandhu sales pathi dhayavu seidhu solladhinga okay. Dhayavu seidhu neenga desperate pannaadhinga. Yenna unggakitta salesle stress kidayathu sir. Naan sales vishayama edhuvum varala sir.
Executive: Seri bye. Idhu thaan neenga rendu moonu naala sollindu irukkaradhu.
Executive: Vidunga. Illa sir idhu pannurathukkaaga thaan namma ket.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's account logged in from another system.

- Customer received irrelevant ads.

- Customer wants to know the reason for the issue.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the 'sign out all devices' option.

- Executive assured to check the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check if the customer's account was misused.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- login, ads, it team, sign out, otp
